title: Places of typographic interest in Dublin
content:
Any ideas?

I should be there quite soon and am open to all avenues.

Best.
author: Michael Green

comments.content:
Marsh’s Library [http://www.marshlibrary.ie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071214/http:/www.marshlibrary.ie/ "http://www.marshlibrary.ie/")  
Chester Beatty Library [http://www.cbl.ie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071214/http:/www.cbl.ie/ "http://www.cbl.ie/")  
Trinity College Library [http://www.tcd.ie/Library/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071214/http:/www.tcd.ie/Library/ "http://www.tcd.ie/Library/")  
National Print Museum [http://www.nationalprintmuseum.ie/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071214/http:/www.nationalprintmuseum.ie/ "http://www.nationalprintmuseum.ie/")

Around the city [http://dublintype.tumblr.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417071214/http:/dublintype.tumblr.com/ "http://dublintype.tumblr.com/")
riccard0 - Much appreciated - Thank you very much
